Lumiere.name: Lumiere with Inspirato
Lumiere.description: A luxury hotel that is 50ft away from the slopes and has stunning views right from your room or suite

HotelTelluride.name: The Hotel Telluride
HotelTelluride.description: A boutique chalet that is located close to Telluride's shops and ski resort

CamelsGarden.name: Camel's Garden Hotel & Condominiums
CamelsGarden.description: Camel's Garden boasts a great location that is directly next to the free Gondola, the San Miguel River Trail, and is close to Telluride's downtown area

QualityInn.name: Quality Inn Ouray
QualityInn.description: Located in downtown Ouray, this hotel is near the Ouray hot springs and has great mountain views. 1 hour drive to Telluride on paved road; can otherwise go through Camp Bird Road

Madeline.name: Madeline Hotel & Residences
Madeline.description: Located in central Mountain Village, this luxury hotel has a pool and hot tub to relax in after a day on the slopes
